chunks.title: Professional Summary and Current Role
chunks.content: Gurkaran Singh is an experienced technology leader, having served as Founder, CEO, CTO, and technical consultant for multiple technology companies and startups. With over 9 years of professional experience in software development, SaaS/cloud application development, system architecture, and mobile development (Android/iOS), Gurkaran has a broad and deep technical background. Currently, he is working on a contract basis with the British Asian Trust in collaboration with the Delhi Government, developing an early warning system to detect students at risk of dropping out of school.

chunks.title: Technical Skills and Expertise
chunks.content:
Gurkaran possesses a wide range of technical skills, including:

- Mobile Development: Android and cross-platform using Flutter, Java, Kotlin, Swift
- Backend Development: Node.js (Nest.js), ASP.NET, Django, Axum (Rust), Phoenix (Elixir), Java Spring Boot & MVC
- Cloud Infrastructure: Docker, Docker Swarm, Terraform, ISTIO, Nginx, HAProxy, Envoy, Ansible, Hystrix
- Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, GCP, OpenStack
- Code Management: Github, Nx/Lerna (Mono-repos), Git, Jenkins, Cypress, container registries
- Web Development: Gatsby, Next.js, Svelte, CRA, Umi.js (React frameworks)
- System Design: Microservice event-driven architecture, with awareness of its limitations
- Desktop App Development: Electron.js, C# (WinForms, WPF, UWP)
- Native Development: Modern C++, Rust
- Data Management: R, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib
- Low-level Programming: C, Objective-C, C++, Objective-C++, CMake

chunks.title: Professional Experience Overview
chunks.content:
Gurkaran's career includes key roles at several organizations:

- Dot Net Developer at 4TechBugsTechnologies, NSP, New Delhi (entry-level role)
- Senior Software Engineer at Grevity Pvt. Ltd., New Delhi
- Senior Software Developer at Ujja India Technologies, Maharashtra
- Chief Technology Officer at SunoKitaab Private Ltd., Shalimar Bagh, New Delhi
- Senior Technical Consultant at British Asian Trust & DCPCR, NCT of Delhi Government

This progression highlights his growth from developer roles to senior leadership and consultancy positions.

chunks.title: Soft Skills and Leadership Qualities
chunks.content:
Gurkaran demonstrates strong soft skills and leadership abilities, including:

- Building trustful relationships and acting as a confidant and problem-solver
- Team player who fosters collaboration and a positive work environment
- Effective communicator, ensuring clarity and efficiency in work processes
- Influential leader, earning team respect and guiding decision-making
- Adaptability to various companies, startups, and team dynamics
- Conflict resolution skills, contributing to team harmony and productivity
- Sound decision-making, earning trust and respect
- Commitment and loyalty, contributing to organizational growth and success

chunks.title: Educational Background
chunks.content: Gurkaran holds a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science from Indarprastha University. He completed his high school education at Jain Bharti Model School.
